title: Тело как гаджет
overview: The four-part series explores how modern technology and innovation affect our bodies and health. Each episode takes a closer look at key topics: mind, vision, skin, and blood. You'll learn about biohacking and how to start your own blood rejuvenation mechanism. The show also reveals special methods that will help people optimize their biological processes: from sleep and nutrition to physical activity and mental work. The show also addresses the ethics of using technology in medicine and considers what prospects and challenges await us in the future.
